mapper.select: select cart_id as cartId, account_number as accountNumber, a.product_id as productId, pay_amount as payAmount, product_name as productName, product_stock as productStock, product_no as productNo, product_specs as productSpecs, out_price as productPrice, product_url as productUrl from shopping_cart as a, product as b where a.product_id = b.product_id and account_number = #{accountNumber};
mapper.insert: insert into shopping_cart (cart_id, account_number, product_id, pay_amount, product_specs) values (#{cartId}, #{accountNumber}, #{productId}, #{payAmount}, #{productSpecs});
